title: Roxy Jacenko rubs shoulders with Kim Kardashian's hairstylist Jen Atkin at the Bumble Bizz Summit
text:
Roxy Jacenko put her best foot forward when she stepped out for the Bumble Bizz Summit in Sydney on Thursday night.

And the 39-year-old celebrity publicist was in good company, rubbing shoulders with Kim Kardashian's hairstylist, Jen Atkin.

Jen, 39, was the headlining guest at the event, which featured panel discussions with female entrepreneurs.

Networking: Roxy Jacenko (left) put her best foot forward when she stepped out for the Bumble Bizz Summit in Sydney on Thursday night, rubbing shoulders with Kim Kardashian's hairstylist, Jen Atkin (right)

Roxy was one of the panelists, sitting on stage alongside blogger Elle Ferguson and fashion stylist Lana Wilkinson.

The three women were seen sharing a laugh as they spoke about their experiences in business.

The event was moderated by Shelly Horton, who stepped out in a floor-length yellow floral print dress.

Power players: Roxy was one of the panelists, sitting on stage alongside blogger Elle Ferguson (right) and fashion stylist Lana Wilkinson (left)

Funny girls: The three women were seen sharing a laugh as they spoke about their experiences in business

Meanwhile, Roxy looked chic in a black pleated leather-look skirt, which she paired with a racer back black tank top.

Her long blonde hair was styled in loose waves, and she rounded out her ensemble with a pair of black pointy-toe stilettos.

'What an absolute blast! Today a panelist for the first @bumble_australia #bumblebizz APAC conference - thank you for having me,' she wrote on Instagram, adding a love heart emoji.

'What an absolute blast! Today a panelist for the first @bumble_australia #bumblebizz APAC conference - thank you for having me,' Roxy wrote on Instagram, adding a love heart emoji

Dressed for business: Jen looked stylish in a check skirt, which she paired with a matching structured button-up blazer and belt

Jen looked stylish in a check skirt, which she paired with a matching structured button-up blazer and belt.

She finished off her ensemble with a pair of strappy white stilettos by Bottega Veneta, which featured knot detailing.

The renowned celebrity hairstylist is known for working with stars such as the Kardashians, Jennifer Lopez, Gigi and Bella Hadid, and Chrissy Teigen.

Calling it in: She happily hammed it up on a set styled like an office, pretending to take an animated phone call while jotting down notes with a pen and paper

Big names: The renowned celebrity hairstylist is known for working with stars such as the Kardashians, Jennifer Lopez, Gigi and Bella Hadid, and Chrissy Teigen

She happily hammed it up on a set styled like an office, pretending to take an animated phone call while jotting down notes with a pen and paper.

According to Bumble APAC Marketing Director Michelle Battersby, the event was a 'huge success', with 500 Bumble subscribers in attendance.

'The stellar line up of speakers lit up the room and I hope that everyone in the audience left feeling [as] inspired and motivated as I did,' she said in a media statement.
description: Roxy Jacenko put her best foot forward at the Bumble Bizz Summit in Sydney on Thursday night. And she was in good company, rubbing shoulders with Kim Kardashian's hairstylist, Jen Atkin.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
